attributes.action: Council Rates MUST be made Fair, at Present NOT same for 1 Bed and 5 Bed, WRONG
attributes.additional_details:
It is obvious that MORE people create more mess, but they should Pay More and Per Bedrooms that they have, or the Amount of People living in their Property, this could be done through the Properties sending in the Forms each year by Adding Children to the List.

Let’s have the System Fair for All.
attributes.background: Where we live the Whole Road has the same Rates, there are 1 2 3 4 and 5 Bed Properties, the large ones puts out around 8 bags of Rubbish while the 1 and 2 puts out 1 Bag, yet Pays the same, this is Unfair, Some has had Added more Bedrooms and Converted Sheds, Shame on a Single Person Against seven.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
